Articles.Content:
I've currently had a 5th generation ipod touch since Christmas, and so far, I haven't really gotten any good games except for Radiant and Simple Rockets.

Is there any games that you guys could suggest?

I don't play alot of mobile games, but here's a few i have on my touch in case i get stranded on an island:

Space agency

Payback 2

Solar creator

battleship craft

plague Inc.

Survival craft, a decent free minecraft clone.
